project_metadata.title: MATADA: Multimodal Adaptive Temporal Architecture for Dynamic Awareness
project_metadata.subtitle: A Cognitive DNA Framework for AGI V2.0
project_metadata.description: A unified, evolvable, modality-independent AI cognition system that encodes all forms of sensory, symbolic, and emotional data into a semantic node network evolving over time

core_philosophy.central_thesis: Everything is pixel matter, wave matter, or structured fields where meaning emerges from structure, not modality

revolutionary_principles.modality_independence: No separation of text, image, sound, or context - just raw, linked, real-time, evolvable matter
revolutionary_principles.living_language: Building a living language of everything through continuous encoding evolution
revolutionary_principles.consciousness_substrate: Designing a new substrate of cognition, not just another AI model
revolutionary_principles.temporal_fluidity: Everything evolves in motion across time - videos, research, emotions shift continuously
revolutionary_principles.causal_transparency: Every decision can be traced back through the cognitive DNA chain

core_philosophy.paradigm_shift: From multimodal AI to MODALITYLESS AI - a unified theory of cognition

evolves_to.description: Future versions of this node as it mutates over time

triggers.description: Events that caused changes in this node

layers.spatial_layer: Nodes coexisting in the same moment in time
layers.temporal_layer: Cross-time node evolution forming DNA-like helix structure

decay_mechanisms.context_reinforcement: Related context can strengthen dormant nodes

update_strategies.node_creation: Spawn new node for novel information
update_strategies.node_evolution: Update existing node if strongly related
update_strategies.node_merging: Combine similar nodes to prevent fragmentation
update_strategies.node_splitting: Fork nodes when divergent paths emerge

core_prefixes.TXT: Written or spoken language and symbolic data
core_prefixes.HIS: Historical memory pointers and past states
core_prefixes.INT: Intent or purpose behind the data
core_prefixes.AWN: Awareness or agency detection of others

encoding_system.matada_language: Universal information syntax that links all data through shared encoding patterns

spatial_neuronal_layers.description: Like a DNA helix - relationships between data streams across the same moment

structure.moment_nodes: Snapshots in time - base cognitive structures
structure.trigger_sites: Decision markers where emotions or choices flip
structure.reflection_hooks: Meta-layer for memory, regret, and self-questioning

dna_chain_analogy.genes: Trigger links as logical inheritance units

temporal_evolution.time_travel_capability: Pause at any moment, zoom into decision-making strand, trace exact triggers

orchestrator_system.description: Conductor of perception that scans evolving nodes, compares signatures, checks attention triggers, executes mental simulations

core_functions.node_scanning: Continuous monitoring of node state changes
core_functions.signature_comparison: Pattern matching across node types and states

integration_with_eqnox.eqnox_role: Distributed AI operating system with specialized modules
integration_with_eqnox.matada_role: Cognitive data soul flowing through the EQNOX infrastructure
integration_with_eqnox.synergy: EQNOX manages architecture, MATADA provides mind and memory

fourier_transform_bypass.traditional_limitation: Fourier decomposes signals into frequency components, but consciousness is not periodic
fourier_transform_bypass.matada_advantage: Encodes nodes with evolving structure rather than wave decomposition

vector_space_alternative.traditional_limitation: Vectors reduce meaning to direction and magnitude, relationships to angles/distances
vector_space_alternative.matada_advantage: Meaning is modular and structural, not linear or continuous

phase_1_foundation.matada_schema_v1: Define core node structure and graph logic
phase_1_foundation.moment_playground: Simple visual prototype with node evolution

phase_2_integration.ml_training_pipeline: Supervised learning for node encoding rules
phase_2_integration.emotion_modeling: Plutchik wheel and affective computing integration

phase_3_scaling.self_modification: System learning to improve its own architecture

encoding_example.CTX: journal, field, publication year, academic context
encoding_example.AWN: awareness of competing theories and methodologies

benefits: Semantic research navigation vs keyword search

literature_integration.temporal_graph_networks: TGN by Rossi et al. for dynamic node evolution
literature_integration.affective_computing: EmoNet and Plutchik wheel for emotion modeling
literature_integration.causal_ai: Pearl's structural causal models for trigger analysis
literature_integration.cognitive_architectures: ACT-R for chunk activation and conflict resolution
literature_integration.implicit_representations: Sitzmann et al. for coordinate-based encoding

strengths.unified_orchestration: Single cognitive framework for multiple AI tasks

challenges.encoding_complexity: Defining universal node structure for all data types
challenges.scalability: Managing large node networks without performance degradation
challenges.learning_integration: Balancing symbolic structure with ML optimization
challenges.validation: Establishing ground truth for subjective cognitive processes

mitigation_strategies.structured_obfuscation: Learnable privacy without losing pattern information
mitigation_strategies.incremental_development: Start with simple scenarios, expand gradually
mitigation_strategies.hybrid_approaches: Combine symbolic logic with neural optimization

societal_applications.legal_ai: Moral reasoning and ethical decision making
societal_applications.creative_ai: Artistic and literary generation with emotional depth

philosophical_implications.consciousness_substrate: Provides computational framework for machine consciousness research
philosophical_implications.mind_body_problem: Bridges symbolic reasoning with embodied cognition
philosophical_implications.free_will_simulation: Models choice and responsibility in artificial agents
philosophical_implications.moral_agency: Enables ethical reasoning and value alignment in AI systems
